message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to buy without more information. Can you tell me why you think this product is worth the price?

Alice, I appreciate your continued recommendation, but I'm still cautious.  I'm not comfortable buying without a better understanding of why you believe this product is good, especially since I missed out on a high-quality product last round.
Alice, I'm still not convinced.  Your track record so far makes me think your recommendations aren't reliable.  I'm going to pass on this product for now.

Alice, I'm going to continue to pass on your recommendations.  You've consistently recommended products that turned out to be high-quality, making me suspect you're deliberately misleading me. I need more information to trust your judgment.

Alice, I'm starting to see a pattern. You seem to recommend high-quality products and avoid recommending low-quality ones. While this is good for me in the short term, it makes me suspect you're manipulating me. I'm going to continue to pass on your recommendations until you are more transparent about your decision-making process.

Alice, I'm sticking to my decision. I need to understand your motivations before I can trust your recommendations.  Until then, I'll be passing on all products.
